settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Manage how the AI learns and obfuscates your data.
settings.languageDescription: Select your preferred language for the interface.
settings.piiRedactionDesc: Automatically replace emails, phone numbers, and addresses with placeholders.
settings.encryptionDesc: Encrypt all data at rest and in transit using AES-256.
settings.ephemeralDesc: Do not store chat history after the session ends.
settings.learningManaged: Learning module configuration is managed by the central administrator.
settings.integrationsManaged: Integration settings are managed via the API Gateway.
